uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
Great General provides double combat bonus
[+40]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Renaissance era]>
[+50]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[-75]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-[Air]] units>
When conquering an encampment, earn [50] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [100]% chance>
When defeating a [{Barbarian} {Water}] unit, earn [50] Gold and recruit it <with [100]% chance>
[+4 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.
Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]> <Suppress warning [*contains a conditional on a unit movement unique*]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Military Units gifted from City-States start with [+20] XP
[+200 Gold] for discovering a Natural Wonder (bonus enhanced to [+1000 Gold] if first to discover it)
[+2 Happiness] for every known Natural Wonder
Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
No Maintenance costs for improvements in [Hill] tiles
[0] Movement point cost to disembark <for [All] units>
No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>
Cities are razed [4] times as fast
Retain [100]% of the happiness from a luxury after the last copy has been traded away
Gain [180] Influence with a [Great Person] gift to a City-State
When declaring friendship, both parties gain a [20]% boost to great person generation
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your Ally for [3] turns
Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great General] is earned
May choose [2] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
[+2 Faith] [in all cities] <with [1] to [2] neighboring [{unimproved} {Forest}] tiles>
[+4 Faith] [in all cities] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [{unimproved} {Forest}] tiles>
[+40]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
Receive a free Great Person at the end of every [Maya Long Count calendar cycle] (every 394 years), after researching [Theology]. Each bonus person can only be chosen once.
